title: Birds
lyrics: Tone   (x2) Two hearts, one valve Pumpin' the blood, we were the flood Two lives, one life Stickin' it out, lettin' you down Seasons, they will change Life will make you grow Dreams will make you cry, cry, cry Everything is temporary Everything will slide Love will never die, die, die Ooh, Birds fly in every direction Ooh, I hope to see you again Sunsets, sunrises Livin' the dream, watchin' the leaves Some nights I think of you Relivin' the past, wishin' it'd last Seasons, they will change Life will make you grow Death can make you hard, hard, hard Everything is temporary Everything will slide Love will never die, die, die Ooh, Birds fly in every direction Ooh, I hope to see you again Ooh, Birds fly in every direction Ooh, So fly high, so fly high When the moon is lookin' down Shine that light up for your ground I'm flyin' up to let you see That the shadow cast is me Ooh, Birds fly in every direction Ooh, I hope to see you again Ooh, Birds fly in every direction Ooh, So fly high, so fly high Ooh, So fly high, so fly high Ooh, So fly high, so fly high
